existing_features.title: Update the Product Form modal so the Product Name dropdown options are populated from backend product data (actor.listProducts via the existing React Query products query) instead of using the hardcoded PRODUCT_NAMES constant.

Make the Product Name dropdown a long dropdown with default internal scrolling when there are many options by constraining the dropdown content height and enabling overflow scrolling on the dropdown list.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a long product-name dropdown in the Product Form populated from backend data, using default scroll behavior when the list is long
